availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George Washington Noel (Hopkins County, Kentucky, physician)

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, physician. Kentucky native. Married to Emma Marshall Summers in 1832. Father of William T. Noel. Physician in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned four enslaved persons in Hopkins County in 1850. Physician in Hopkins County in 1860. Owned seven enslaved persons in Hopkins County in 1860. Provost marshal of Madisonville during Civil War.

ab.bibl:

The Biographical Encyclopedia of Kentucky of the Dead and Living Men of the Nineteenth Century, vol. 1 (Cincinnati: J. M. Armstrong & Company, 1878), 691-692.
